ValidationRule.description: Don't allow programs outside the country
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND ( NOT(ISPICKVAL(Related_Priority__r.Country__c, "Both")), OR ( AND (ISPICKVAL(Related_Priority__r.Country__c, "USA"), ISPICKVAL(CurrencyIsoCode, "AUD") ), AND (ISPICKVAL(Related_Priority__r.Country__c, "AUS"), ISPICKVAL(CurrencyIsoCode, "USD") ) ) )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: This program is not allowed in this country, please select another option
